answers.answer: Some techs will tell you around 16 weeks. some wait until 20 weeks. Congratulations on the twins
I get my sono Friday but that's with my diabetes Dr my other Dr won't give me a sono til I'm 20 weeks
You can ask and see what they say.
Congrats. Im having twins as well. But im only 14 weeks.
Thank yu nd congrats to yu too..can yu feel them yet?
No not yet.I cant wait until I do.  But I found out they are ferternal.

question: I will be 16 weeks Monday nd I have a sono Friday will they be able to tell me the gender of my twins?!
title: twins
